name: Playing With Knives
description:
Throw Knives to defeat your enemies, but watch out! Once your knives are separated from your body they can damage you too!

W/A/S/D To Move (Left Joystick on Mobile)

Left Click to Throw (Right Joystick on Mobile)

Hold Right Click to Activate Your Slow Time Ability (Double Tap Right Joystick on Mobile)

Hit Esc (or the settings button in the top right) at any time in game to access settings/pause!

This game supports Mobile Devices! Play with Knives anywhere you go! Make sure your phone is in Landscape Mode (sideways) and Fullscreen the game for the best experience (you may also need to enable auto rotation on your phone). Any Touchscreen device is automatically recognized as a mobile device, but if you have a keyboard to use instead then you can turn off mobile mode in the settings.

(Note: Mobile Users can hold their finger over the powerups to view the description, it will only select a powerup once your finger is released)

I highly highly recommend playing on PC if at all possible, as the game was designed to run on pc first and foremost.

Also on Liluo.io!
